select sum(a.ormtqt)ormtqt_count,sum(a.ormtqs) ormtqs_count,count(distinct c.spseno) spseno_count,count(distinct c.spclno) spclno_count,count(distinct a.sampno) sampno_count from ORD_ORDDTL a,ord_sample_design b,ord_sample_plan c where a.sampno=b.sampno and b.plspno=c.plspno and a.mtorno=#{mtorno}
